This resource is intended for high school computer science teachers seeking to extend student learning beyond AP Computer Science courses. It provides a teacher-facing guide for the After the AP Capstone.

The materials for the capstone are designed for students who have completed AP Computer Science Principles or AP Computer Science A, or who have comparable experience with text-based programming.
